title: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun T (A Certain Scientific Railgun T)
synopsis: The Daihasei Festival has begun, and that of course means that Tokiwadai Middle School—a prestigious all-girls' middle school—is competing too. Despite the participation of the "Ace of Tokiwadai," Mikoto Misaka, the other students who are participating are still putting their utmost effort into winning, no matter how impossible the feat may seem against her might.
related_anime: ['Toaru Kagaku no Railgun T: Motto Marutto Railgun', 'Toaru Majutsu no Index', 'Toaru Kagaku no Railgun S', 'Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun']
